title: Quarterly average daily rate of hotels in New York 2016 to 2017
summary: This grouped bar chart shows Average daily rate in USD on the Y-axis for 4 different Quarters for 2 groups 2016, and 2017 that are presented on the X-axis.
All through the Quarters, the Average daily rate in USD for 2016 have lowered. On the other hand, for Quarter the Average daily rate in USD have grew.
In Quarter Q4, 2016 had the highest Average daily rate in USD 389.0 among the 2 groups and in Q4, 2017 had the lowest Average daily rate in USD 0.0.
In Quarter Q4, 2016 had the maximum Average daily rate in USD and it saw the lowest in Quarter Q1 out of all 4 Quarters.
min_summary: This grouped bar chart represents 4 different Quarters on X-axis for 2 groups 2016, and 2017. On the Y-axis it shows their corresponding Average daily rate in USD.
All through the Quarters, the Average daily rate in USD for 2016 have lowered. On the other hand, for Quarter the Average daily rate in USD have grew.
mid_summary: This grouped bar chart shows Average daily rate in USD on the Y-axis for 4 different Quarters for 2 groups 2016, and 2017 that are presented on the X-axis.
All through the Quarters, the Average daily rate in USD for 2016 have lowered. On the other hand, for Quarter the Average daily rate in USD have grew.
In Quarter Q4, 2016 had the highest Average daily rate in USD 389.0 among the 2 groups and in Q4, 2017 had the lowest Average daily rate in USD 0.0.
In Quarter Q4, 2016 had the maximum Average daily rate in USD and it saw the lowest in Quarter Q1 out of all 4 Quarters.
max_summary: This grouped bar chart shows Average daily rate in USD on the Y-axis for 4 different Quarters for 2 groups 2016, and 2017 that are presented on the X-axis.
Over the 4 Quarters, the Average daily rate in USD for 2016 have been lowered whereas grew for Quarter.
Quarter Q4 had the maximum Average daily rate in USD among all 2 groups, and it was for 2016. The minimum Average daily rate in USD was observed in Quarter Q4 for 2017.
Among all the Quarters, 2016 had the highest Average daily rate in USD in Quarter Q4 and lowest Average daily rate in USD in Quarter Q1.
There is a gap of 129.0 between the highest and lowest Average daily rate in USD found for 2016 in Quarter Q4 and Q1.
Among all 2 groups, 2016 had the gap of 129.0 between the maximum and minimum Average daily rate in USD observed in Quarter Q4 and Q1 respectively.
On average, the Quarter Q1 had the highest Average daily rate in USD for all 2 groups 2016, and 2017. Whereas Q3 had the lowest average Average daily rate in USD.
